languages.text: {n}Воин обращает взгляд прямо на вас, и зеленый огонь вспыхивает в глазницах костром.{/n} "Небытие — не исток скорби! Небытие — энтропическая предрешенность! Свершены были ошибки, нарушены императивы! Династия Йекхмет заступила на стражу зерна катаклизма. Зерно не было убережено. Катаклизм прорастает из него. Честь попрана".

{n}The warrior turns his gaze directly on you. The green light in his eyes flares up like a bonfire.{/n} "Inexistence is entropically preordained! It is no cause for grief! The egregious mistakes are! The violated imperatives are! The Yekhmet dynasty took watch of the seed of the cataclysm. The seed was neglected. A cataclysm has sprouted from it. Honour has been trampled underfoot."

languages.text: {n}Le guerrier pointe son regard droit sur vous. La lumière verte de ses yeux flamboie comme un brasier.{/n} « L'entropie rend l'inexistence inéluctable ! Elle n'est pas cause de peine, contrairement aux erreurs monumentales ou aux impératifs non respectés ! La dynastie Yekhmet veillait sur la graine du cataclysme, mais elle a été négligée et un cataclysme en a germé. L'honneur a été foulé aux pieds. »
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior turns his gaze directly on you. The green light in his eyes flares up like a bonfire.{/n} "Inexistence is entropically preordained! It is no cause for grief! The egregious mistakes are! The violated imperatives are! The Yekhmet dynasty took watch of the seed of the cataclysm. The seed was neglected. A cataclysm has sprouted from it. Honour has been trampled underfoot."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le guerrier pointe son regard droit sur vous. La lumière verte de ses yeux flamboie comme un brasier.{/n} « L'entropie rend l'inexistence inéluctable ! Elle n'est pas cause de peine, contrairement aux erreurs monumentales ou aux impératifs non respectés ! La dynastie Yekhmet veillait sur la graine du cataclysme, mais elle a été négligée et un cataclysme en a germé. L'honneur a été foulé aux pieds. »

languages.text: {n}El guerrero te mira directamente. La luz verde de sus ojos se propaga como una hoguera.{/n} «¡La inexistencia viene determinada entrópicamente! ¡No hay por qué acongojarse por ello! ¡Por los errores irremediables, en cambio, sí! ¡Por los preceptos vulnerados sí! La dinastía Yekhmet velaba por la semilla del cataclismo. Hasta que fue desatendida. De ella ha brotado un cataclismo. El honor ha quedado pisoteado».
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior turns his gaze directly on you. The green light in his eyes flares up like a bonfire.{/n} "Inexistence is entropically preordained! It is no cause for grief! The egregious mistakes are! The violated imperatives are! The Yekhmet dynasty took watch of the seed of the cataclysm. The seed was neglected. A cataclysm has sprouted from it. Honour has been trampled underfoot."

La luz verde de sus ojos se propaga como una hoguera.{/n} «¡La inexistencia viene determinada entrópicamente! ¡No hay por qué acongojarse por ello! ¡Por los errores irremediables, en cambio, sí! ¡Por los preceptos vulnerados sí! La dinastía Yekhmet velaba por la semilla del cataclismo. Hasta que fue desatendida. De ella ha brotado un cataclismo. El honor ha quedado pisoteado».

languages.text: {n}这个战士将目光直接转向了你，眼中的绿光像篝火一样燃烧起来。{/n}“死亡是熵注定的结果！这并不是悲伤的理由！悲伤的理由是那些令人震惊的错误！是那些遭到违反的命令！叶赫迈特王朝为这场灾难埋下了祸根。那些种子遭到了忽视，灾难由此而生，荣耀遭到践踏。”
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior turns his gaze directly on you. The green light in his eyes flares up like a bonfire.{/n} "Inexistence is entropically preordained! It is no cause for grief! The egregious mistakes are! The violated imperatives are! The Yekhmet dynasty took watch of the seed of the cataclysm. The seed was neglected. A cataclysm has sprouted from it. Honour has been trampled underfoot."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个战士将目光直接转向了你，眼中的绿光像篝火一样燃烧起来。{/n}“死亡是熵注定的结果！这并不是悲伤的理由！悲伤的理由是那些令人震惊的错误！是那些遭到违反的命令！叶赫迈特王朝为这场灾难埋下了祸根。那些种子遭到了忽视，灾难由此而生，荣耀遭到践踏。”

languages.text: {n}戦士はその眼差しをあなたに向ける。その目に宿る緑色の光が篝火のように燃え上がる。{/n}「現存はエントロピー的にあらかじめ定められたものなのだ！それは嘆き悲しむべきことではない！甚だしい過ち！蹂躙された規則なり！イェクメト王朝は大変動の種を見守った。その種は軽視された。大変動はそこから芽生えた。名誉はその足元で踏みにじられたのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior turns his gaze directly on you. The green light in his eyes flares up like a bonfire.{/n} "Inexistence is entropically preordained! It is no cause for grief! The egregious mistakes are! The violated imperatives are! The Yekhmet dynasty took watch of the seed of the cataclysm. The seed was neglected. A cataclysm has sprouted from it. Honour has been trampled underfoot."

traits.locale_text: {n}戦士はその眼差しをあなたに向ける。その目に宿る緑色の光が篝火のように燃え上がる。{/n}「現存はエントロピー的にあらかじめ定められたものなのだ！それは嘆き悲しむべきことではない！甚だしい過ち！蹂躙された規則なり！イェクメト王朝は大変動の種を見守った。その種は軽視された。大変動はそこから芽生えた。名誉はその足元で踏みにじられたのだ」

languages.text: {n}Der Krieger richtet seinen Blick direkt auf dich. Das grüne Licht in seinen Augen flammt auf wie ein Lagerfeuer.{/n} "Inexistenz ist entropisch vorherbestimmt! Sie ist keine Ursache für Trauer! Die unerhörten Fehler sind es! Die verletzten Imperative sind es! Die Yekhmet-Dynastie hat die Wache über die Saat des Kataklysmus übernommen. Die Saat wurde vernachlässigt. Ein Kataklysmus ist daraus erwachsen. Die Ehre wurde mit Füßen getreten."
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior turns his gaze directly on you. The green light in his eyes flares up like a bonfire.{/n} "Inexistence is entropically preordained! It is no cause for grief! The egregious mistakes are! The violated imperatives are! The Yekhmet dynasty took watch of the seed of the cataclysm. The seed was neglected. A cataclysm has sprouted from it. Honour has been trampled underfoot."

Sie ist keine Ursache für Trauer! Die unerhörten Fehler sind es! Die verletzten Imperative sind es! Die Yekhmet-Dynastie hat die Wache über die Saat des Kataklysmus übernommen. Die Saat wurde vernachlässigt. Ein Kataklysmus ist daraus erwachsen. Die Ehre wurde mit Füßen getreten."

languages.text: {n}Savaşçı, bakışlarını doğrudan sana çeviriyor. Gözlerindeki yeşil ışık, alev gibi yükseliyor.{/n} "Yok oluş, etropik olarak önceden belirlenmiştir! Onun için üzülmeye gerek yoktur! Fakat korkunç hatalar için üzülünür! İhlal edilen zorunluluklar için üzülünür! Yekhmet hanedanlığı, felaketin tohumuna göz kulak oldu. Tohum ihmal edildi ve ondan bir felaket yeşillendi. Onurumuz ayaklar altına alındı."
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior turns his gaze directly on you. The green light in his eyes flares up like a bonfire.{/n} "Inexistence is entropically preordained! It is no cause for grief! The egregious mistakes are! The violated imperatives are! The Yekhmet dynasty took watch of the seed of the cataclysm. The seed was neglected. A cataclysm has sprouted from it.
